path: ./Audit_Reports_2024/Verichains_Lab/Verichains Public Audit Report - U2Win Smartcontracts - v1.0.pdf

findings.title: No mechanism to check if minting has reached MAX_SUPPLY or not LOW
findings.description: Users with MINTER_ROLE can mint an unlimited number of NFTs without checking if it reaches the MAX_SUPPLY limit for each category.

findings.title: Insufficient Minting Quantity in buy() Function
findings.description: The buy() function does not mint the sufficient quantity for the buyer
